column1: '''Marian Diamond''' ([[1941]]) is an English actress. Known primarily for her voice
column2: she has worked for the [[BBC]] for years. She narrated several episodes of ''[[Jackanory]]'' (dealing with [[C.S. Lewis]]' books mostly)
column3: and she voiced the [[Galadriel]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' radio series]].
